===Etymology===
Literally: to give one's body to reckless abandon.
: From the ''[[wikisource:Preface to the Poems Composed at the Orchid Pavilion|Preface to the Poems Composed at the Orchid Pavilion]]'', by [[w:Wang Xizhi|Wang Xizhi]] (王羲之).

===Idiom===
{{zh-idiom}}

# to refuse to be bound by convention; to abandon oneself to [[Bohemianism]]
